# isGeometricDistortionCorrectionEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether geometric distortion correction is enabled for this device.

## Declaration

```swift
var isGeometricDistortionCorrectionEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the device supports geometric distortion correction (GDC), the default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Enabling geometric distortion correction

- **isGeometricDistortionCorrectionSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this device supports geometric distortion correction.
